title: Connect a metrics data source to Grafana Cloud

blocks.content:
Use this interactive guide to learn how to start connecting **Prometheus metrics** to Grafana Cloud. You’ll explore where metrics connections live, select Prometheus from the connection catalog, and review the information required to complete setup.



This guide helps you get oriented and understand the setup process, without requiring existing infrastructure or completing the connection.

Metrics, logs, and traces all start with a connection.

Begin by opening Connections to see where you can add and manage data sources in Grafana Cloud.

To connect metrics data, start by adding a new connection.

This opens the catalog where you can browse and choose the type of data source you want to connect.

This page is where you start adding new data connections in Grafana Cloud.

From here, select Search connections to browse available data sources and choose a metrics provider, such as Prometheus. Each provider includes guided steps to help you understand what’s required to connect your metrics.

You don’t need to complete a setup now. You can return to Connections at any time when you’re ready to continue.
